ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Detail level - Low ...?
ygData.msgSnippet: When you did big raids with many people - you ll have no choice but turn the off.  Also pretty necessary to turn of PC names as well. Slyde ... From: Stephen
ygData.messageBody:
When you did big raids with many people - you'll have no choice but turn the
off. Also pretty necessary to turn of PC names as well.

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Stephen McCloskey [mailto:s.mccloskey@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 17, 2001 9:38 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Detail level - Low ...?

I personally love the particle effects and I never play with out them. I
always kept the density set to low ...but the sparkles look the same to me
on low, med and high. Is it just me? I hit 39 last night and the particle
effects are killing me. I don't want to turn them off but I am not seeing
a choice here. Any suggestions? I play in the "out of body" views already.

-Steve


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
